alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Colleton; Dorchester; Hampton; Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 4:50PM EDT until June 11 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT...HAMPTON...COLLETON...DORCHESTER AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 450 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Smoaks to near Pineland, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Walterboro, Hampton, Saint George, Yemassee, Colleton, Varnville, Furman, Reevesville, Smoaks, Lodge, Williams, Coosawhatchie, Ruffin, Gardens Corner, and Miley. This warning includes I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 28 and 85. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
